item.description:
Night out at Mohegan Sun, aka our mini Vegas here in Connecticut. Please RSVP and feel free to give me a call a day or so in advance 305-423-9524/ Andrew, I'll give you the latest details on the event.

We'll be meeting up at Lucky's Lounge for food and drinks around 9pm. "The East Coast's 1st Las Vegas lounge, Lucky's features New York style pizzas, appetizers, martinis and specialty drinks. Although there is no dance floor, dancing is encouraged anywhere in the lounge!" We'll mingle and socialize at Lucky's - for new members it will be a nice opportunity to meet and get to know everyone in the group. Give me a call 305-423-9524 when you arrive and I'll greet and introduce you in to the group.

http://www.mohegansun...

Around 10:30 we'll make our way to ULTRA 88 Night Club (Ultra88 is right next to Lucky's Lounge). Cover charge on Friday is $10

http://www.mohegansun...

Dress code is trendy upscale.

Please RSVP and feel free to give me a call a day or so in advance 305-423-9524/ Andrew, I'll give you the latest details on the event. SEE YOU THERE!!!!

WOOOOOOOOOOOOO
item.name: ULTRA88 PARTY @ MOHEGAN SUN
